  3507. About 5 months ago I began to experience severe redness & irritation on my scalp after shampooing with my regular products that I have used for quite sometime. My hair stylist also began noticing the redness as well as hair loss on top of my head.<br /><br />I'm a 55 year old male who has always had a very full head of hair so this began to worry & depress me.<br />I began doing a lot of research and found that this redness & hair loss was probably the end result of a common shampoo ingredient called Sodium Lauryl Sulfate. Many other reviews and articles seemed to confirm this.<br /><br />This is an inexpensive detergent and makes mixtures foam well and seemed to be in almost all shampoo products. Just google &#34;Sodium Lauryl Sulfate&#34; and you'll come up with a lot of startling information on it.<br /><br />On Amazon after reading many reviews to find a replacement shampoo without sulfates, I found Pura d'or Hair Loss Prevention Premium Organic Shampoo and to boot it promotes hair growth & fullness.<br /><br />Well, after using the product for 6 months I'm much happier. I was so afraid I was going to go bald. When I came across this shampoo on Groupon, I ordered, and to my delight the first wash showed a significant slowdown in the shedding. As I washed my hair more and more with this shampoo, the shedding all stopped. My hair began to fill out again, and I was relieved and happy to have my hair back.<br />Well, I moved and could not find the shampoo on Groupon anymore, and I was running out of my reserve stock. Never-the-less, I am very happy to have found this shampoo for a decent price once again here on Amazon. I highly recommend it, and when I have it, I do not use any other shampoo product in my hair. Our shampoos and conditioners are free from SLS, Parabens and Gluten!<br /> I tried the shampoo and conditioner first the day after they got here. The Pura d'or Shampoo cleaned my hair well. No residue left behind and it was easy to use. The shampoo was a thinner consistency, but nice and easy to rinse out also. It did leave my hair feeling a little dry, I guess is what I would say. I was in the shower when I used it but I think it more felt over clean...if that makes any sense. At that point I wasn't too sure the conditioner was going to work, I assumed it was going to leave it feeling dried out too. Thankfully that was not the case. The Pura d'or Conditioner worked awesome! The conditioner has a thicker consistency and it was easy to use and rinse. No residue left behind when I used it either. The conditioner worked itself left my hair soft, smooth, and manageable. The scent of the shampoo was an earthysmell. It was a good smell but not usually a scent I would choose for my hair care products. I guess it didn't matter too much because the conditioner smelled great. Strong enough but not too strong and overpowering.<br /><br />My daughters each tried the shampoo and conditioner too. Emmaleigh (5) said &#34;I love this stuff!&#34; when she came out of the bath. Pura d'or The Pure and Organic Argan is great for skin! It's 100% cold pressed. I'm 30 days into the bottle, and definitely thinner in the front of my hair.<br />Now, other products (nioxin for example) sometimes warn that the initial uses may cause more shedding.<br />However, I'm more inclined to suspect that this shampoo is a garbage scam, because:<br />-the ingredients on the bottle are different from the ones listed here on amazon. Many more chemical compounds listed, and even though they are listed as coconut extracts, it is STILL chemical compounds.<br />-a lot of the 5 star reviews here on amazon are CLEARLY fabricated. Clearly someone worked on those reviews- there are some absurd grammatical errors, amongst some really strange sentence formulations.<br /><br />I'm stopping using for now and if I don't see any recovery and re growth in the areas that shed, well, it may be time for some firm actions to be taken.<br /><br />I will report back shortly.

  3731. I bought this off the companies main site. It unfortunately made my hair feel like straw. Used four times and now I have to go through a deep conditioning regimin.   3732. I bought this from a daily deal web site raving about this product. I was bothered by my hair loss and for this price, it doesn't hurt to give it a try. I'm very glad to report back this is a very good product as far as cleaning goes, rich foam, pleasant smell and very easy to rinse. As far as preventing hair loss, I would give it a 3 star compare to the 5 star for cleaning. It did make my hair looks much healthier but I haven noticed any change to stop my hair loss, just reduced the hair loss a little bit.
